Resolve the Abduction

Resolve the Abduction is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Resolve the Abduction can be acquired during Act II and has the player clear the Last Light Inn of Enemies after First Marcus abducts Isobel. Resolve the Abduction is a branching subquest for the main questline Infiltrate Moonrise Towers. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3 a
